# QR Maze - A game that fits within a QR code

![demo](https://cloud-24hb6nqoo-hack-club-bot.vercel.app/0demo.png)

---

QR Maze is a fun little game I developed, designed to fit entirely within the size constraints of a QR code. The game features a maze with various difficulty levels and a timer to track the time spent solving it. Each time you refresh the page, the maze is automatically regenerated, providing a fresh challenge every time you play!

## Demo

Scan this QR code:

![QR code](qr.png)

or paste this into your browser:
```
data:text/html;base64,
```

or just go this [link](https://mengshin.dev/maze/).

## Technologies Used

- HTML
- CSS
- JavaScript
